name: Synthetic User Research SaaS Design System
description: Comprehensive design system for a professional, modern SaaS platform focused on data visualization and user research.

primary.description: Deep blue for primary actions and branding

secondary.description: Light blue for secondary elements and backgrounds

accent.description: Emerald green for success states and highlights

glassmorphism.description: Semi-transparent background with blur for modern overlays

buttons.primary: bg-blue-800 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg transition duration-300 ease-in-out
buttons.secondary: bg-blue-100 hover:bg-blue-200 text-blue-800 font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg transition duration-300 ease-in-out
buttons.outline: border border-blue-800 text-blue-800 hover:bg-blue-800 hover:text-white font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg transition duration-300 ease-in-out

cards.default: bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-6 border border-gray-200
cards.glass: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/10 border border-white/20 rounded-lg p-6 shadow-lg

navigation.nav_item: text-gray-700 hover:text-blue-800 font-medium transition duration-300 ease-in-out

forms.input: border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent
forms.label: block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2
forms.textarea: border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent resize-none

imagery.style: Minimalist, professional illustrations with clean lines and subtle gradients
imagery.color_treatment: Use primary and secondary colors as base, with accent for highlights
imagery.composition: Centered subjects with plenty of white space, focus on clarity and simplicity
imagery.technical: Vector-based or high-resolution PNG, aspect ratios as specified per use case
